attributes.action: Introduce vehicle insurance and MOT Test Certificate discs for vehicle windscreens
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Windscreen discs for vehicle insurance and vehicle MOT tests(VT20) similar to the current Tax Disc.   This may help to force uninsured and unsafe vehicles of the road.   
 They could be renewed with the Road Find Licence(Tax Disc) when due yearly.  Why should the insured driver continue to pay the cost of the uninsured driver.
